SMS_MO_MaximumMessagesPerSecond.description: Maximum number of mobile originated SMS per second that the service provider can handle.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per Second should not be greater than 1000 message per second.

SMS_MO_MaximumMessagesPerDay.description: Maximum number of mobile originated SMS per day that the service provider can handle.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per day should not be greater than 50000000 message per day.
errorResponses.invalidRelation: Max message per day should be greater than message per Second.

NCSDescription.description: Description entered by the user regarding the NCS configuration.

SMS_MT_MaximumRecipientsPerSecond.description: Maximum number of recipients per second the service provider can deliver SMS messages to.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per Second should not be greater than 1000 message per second.

SMS_MT_MaximumRecipientsPerDay.description: Maximum number of recipients per day the service provider can deliver SMS messages to.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per day should not be greater than 50000000 message per day.
errorResponses.invalidRelation: Max message per day should be greater than message per Second.

SMS.successMessage: SMS SLA for Service Provider configured successfully

MMS_MO_MaximumMessagesPerSecond.description: Maximum number of mobile originated MMS per second that the service provider can handle.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per Second should not be greater than 100 message per second.

MMS_MO_MaximumMessagesPerDay.description: Maximum number of mobile originated MMS per day that the service provider can handle.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per day should not be greater than 50000000 message per day.
errorResponses.invalidRelation: Maximum messages per day should be greater than maximum messages per second.

NCSDescription.description: Description entered by the user regarding the NCS configuration.

MMS_MT_MaximumRecipientsPerSecond.description: Maximum number of recipients per second the service provider can deliver MMS messages to.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per Second should not be greater than 100 message per second.

MMS_MT_MaximumRecipientsPerDay.description: Maximum number of recipients per day the service provider can deliver MMS messages to.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per day should not be greater than 50000000 message per day.
errorResponses.invalidRelation: Max message per day should be greater than message per Second.

MMS.successMessage: MMS SLA for Service Provider configured successfully

USSD_MO_MaximumMessagesPerSecond.description: Maximum number of mobile originated USSD messages per second that the service provider can handle.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per Second should not be greater than 1000 message per second.

USSD_MO_MaximumMessagesPerDay.description: Maximum number of mobile originated USSD messages per day that the service provider can handle.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per day should not be greater than 50000000 message per day.
errorResponses.invalidRelation: Max message per day should be greater than message per Second.

NCSDescription.description: Description entered by the user regarding the NCS configuration.

USSD_MT_MaximumRecipientsPerSecond.description: Maximum number of recipients per second the service provider can deliver USSD messages to.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per Second should not be greater than 1000 message per second.

USSD_MT_MaximumRecipientsPerDay.description: Maximum number of recipients per day the service provider can deliver USSD messages to.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max message per day should not be greater than 50000000 message per day.
errorResponses.invalidRelation: Max message per day should be greater than message per Second.

USSD.successMessage: USSD SLA for Service Provider configured successfully

WAPPUSH_MaximumRecipientsPerSecond.description: Maximum number of recipients per second to whom WAP Push messages can be delivered.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max recipients per second should not be greater than 100 recipients per second.

WAPPUSH_MaximumRecipientsPerDay.description: Maximum number of recipients per day to whom WAP Push messages can be delivered.

errorResponses.tooHigh: Max recipients per day should not be greater than 500000000 recipients per day.
errorResponses.invalidRelation: Max recipients per day should be greater than Max recipients per second.

NCSDescription.description: Description entered by the user regarding the NCS configuration.

WAPPUSH.successMessage: WAP-PUSH SLA for Service Provider configured successfully

BAS_MaximumIncomingRequestsPerSecond.description: Maximum number of Billing-as-a-Service incoming requests per second that the service provider can handle.

errorResponses.missing: Maximum BAS Incoming Requests per second required.
errorResponses.tooHigh: Max billing per second should not be greater than 100 billing per second.

BAS_MaximumIncomingRequestsPerDay.description: Maximum number of Billing-as-a-Service incoming requests per day that the service provider can handle.

errorResponses.missing: Maximum BAS Incoming Requests per day required.
errorResponses.tooHigh: Max billing per day should not be greater than 50000000 billing per day.
errorResponses.invalidRelation: Maximum BAS Incoming Requests per day should be greater than maximum requests per second.

NCSDescription.description: Description entered by the user regarding the NCS configuration.

BAS.successMessage: BAS SLA for Service Provider configured successfully

SWS_MaximumIncomingRequestsPerSecond.description: Maximum number of SWS incoming requests per second that the service provider can handle.

errorResponses.missing: Maximum SWS Incoming Requests per second required.
errorResponses.tooHigh: Maximum SWS per second should be less than 1,000.

SWS_MaximumIncomingRequestsPerDay.description: Maximum number of SWS incoming requests per day that the service provider can handle.

errorResponses.missing: Maximum SWS Incoming Requests per day required.
errorResponses.tooHigh: Maximum SWS per second should be less than 50,000,000.
errorResponses.invalidRelation: Maximum SWS incoming requests per day should be greater than maximum requests per second.

NCSDescription.description: Description entered by the user regarding the NCS configuration.

SWS.successMessage: SWS for Service Provider configured successfully
